X.T: The Fable of the Dragon-Tyrant

ARTICLE.COMMENT: Some proselytism to work on solving human senescence.

X.T: Clay Shirky: Institutions vs. collaboration
Clay Shirky: Institutions vs. collaboration

ARTICLE.COMMENT: The very common idea that more and more projects succeed by collaboration rather than by administration. Despite the fact that nothing is new here, ClayShirky's presentation is effective to describe this.

X.T: Hans Rosling: Debunking third-world myths with the best stats you've ever seen
Debunking third-world myths with the best stats you've ever seen

ARTICLE.COMMENT: Using spectacular animated graphics to show that the world is not anymore how we believe it still is. Hans Rosling also explains that the economical data he used should be free for use by all students and professors.

X.T: Les rayons X : Et l'homme devient transparent

ARTICLE.COMMENT: The discovery of X-rays and their danger.

ARTICLE.COMMENT: By analysing DNA of humans all around the planet, SpencerWells tries to find out how and when the humanity conquered the world.
